title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2700.4 - Location
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2700.4 - Location

State Regulations

Records shall be available for public inspection and copying
at: Room 113, State Capitol, Albany, New York, or at the location where they
are kept. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2700.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
